name: Souls .INC
description:
Made in 10 days for VimJam 2 with the requirement "Boss" & the theme "On the edge"

Welcome to hell !

Where all souls come to… get sold for a profit !

At Souls .INC, your soul is our business.

Seize that chance of a lifetime ! Come work for us as a Soul Reaper !

Our company will provide a competitive salary as well as very interesting perks.

Such as an Immortality health care plan, Double jumps spells & telekinetic reaping scythes.

Our CEO, Satan himself, is eager to see you join our workforce.

Controls :

  • Move : wasd or arrow key
  • Jump : w or up or space (you can wall jump & double jump)
  • Throw weapon: enter or z or k
  • Pull back weapon : press  enter or z or k
  • Dash : shift
  • Skip dialogues : enter

Credits:

  • Art, UI & Animations : Spookto
  • Music & sounds : Chris Chen (ChrisComp) - Go check his Soundcloud
  • Development & Level Design : Szym

Fonts : 

  • Wellbutrin by Apostrophic Labs
  • Bitmgothic by Nomi

Extra Thanks :

  • Neverite for the pixel art jam logo
  • PoissonBallon, Deloria, Adrien & Kirbytch for Playtesting
